text:
Question asked
(1) Are both FTE and head count figures to be reported?
(2) Can FTE be used as a proxy for head counts if 99% of the workforce is full-time?
ESRS reference
ESRS S1 paragraphs 50 (a), (b) and (d); 52 (a) and (b); 55 (b)(i); AR 55; and 34
Key terms
Methodology to compile data; FTE
Background
The question received: â€˜Is there a materiality approach for the people reporting in place (for
example, if 99% of the workforce are full-time employees, the difference between our existing
